results.title: Weather - Get Current Conditions - REST API (Azure Maps)
results.description: Possible values: A = heavy thunderstorm/hail BD = blowing dust BN = blowing sand BS = blowing snow D = dust F = fog GF = ground fog HZ = haze I = ice IC = ice crystals IF = ice fog IP = ice pellets IPW = ice pellets shower K = smoke L = drizzle R = rain RS = rain/snow RW = rain shower S = snow SG = snow granules SP = snow pellets SW = snow shower.

descriptions.content: Possible values: A = heavy thunderstorm/hail BD = blowing dust BN = blowing sand BS = blowing snow D = dust F = fog GF = ground fog HZ = haze I = ice IC = ice crystals IF = ice fog IP = ice pellets IPW = ice pellets shower K = smoke L = drizzle R = rain RS = rain/snow RW = rain shower S = snow SG = snow granules SP = snow pellets SW = snow shower.
